mainText:
I have been an apple user since I was born. The first computer we had in 
our home was an apple and I used to spend hours on it. As I grew up I 
continued to use apple products and watched as they changed the world. 
Steve Jobs was a truly inspirational man who changed so many lives 
throughout the world with his innovation and determination.
Thank you for everything you did for me, and the world
author: Greg
